meanings.definition: Comparative form of the adjective 'sizable', meaning of considerable size or extent.
meanings.sent1: The elephant was the siziest animal in the zoo.
meanings.sent2: The blue whale is known to be the siziest mammal on Earth.
meanings.sent3: The siziest cake at the party was so big, it could feed the whole neighborhood!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, the siziest sound of joy.
meanings.sent5: The siziest mountain in the range stood tall and majestic against the sky.

meanings.definition: Superlative form of the adjective 'sizable', meaning of the largest size or extent.
meanings.sent1: Mount Everest is the siziest mountain in the world.
meanings.sent2: The siziest pumpkin at the fair won first prize.
meanings.sent3: The siziest burger on the menu was so huge, it needed two plates!
meanings.sent4: His smile was the siziest, lighting up the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The siziest tree in the forest cast a wide shadow over the clearing.
